page.title: 14THE PEST CONTROL OFFICER
page.content: A LITTLE WHILE AGO THE PEST CONTROL OFFICER (WHO IS EMPLOYED BY THE NEW FOREST DISTRICT COUNCIL) CAME TO SCHOOL TO TELL US ABOUT HIS JOB. RATS AND MICE ARE HIS MAIN CONCERN BUT HE ALSO CONTROLS WASPS,ANTS, BEETLES,FLIES,COCKROACHES AND MOLES. HIS FIRST JOB EVERY DAY IS TO MIX THE VARIOUS POISONS. WHILE HE IS DOING HIS JOB HE ALWAYS WEARS OVERALLS, MASK AND GLOVES, AND FOR WASPS AND HORNETS HE WEARS A SPECIAL HAT WITH WHITE NET ON ONE SIDE, FOR LOOKING THROUGH WHEN HE IS OUTSIDE, AND BLACK NET ON THE OTHER SIDE FOR LOOKING THROUGH INSIDE. THE RAT PELLETS WORK BY STOPPING THE RATS' BLOOD FROM CLOTTING SO THAT THEY BLEED INTERNALLY TO DEATH. SMOKE CAPSULES ARE USED TO KILL INSECTS IN BUILDINGS BUT OUTSIDE POWDER IS SPRAYED ON THE NESTS WITH BELLOWS.
